resources.string: Hello, I\'m Ritik Shankar, a 2nd-year Computer Science Engineering student at KIIT University. \n\nI am passionate about problem-solving and have a keen interest in Android development . Eager to apply my skills and contribute to innovative projects in the tech industry.I am always learning and improving, and I am excited to see what I can accomplish in the future. Please feel free to ask me any questions you have or give me any feedback on how I can be more helpful. If you are learning a new language, I can help you practice conversation and translation.
